Subject: Follow-up: #00440862 - CiscoVPN disabling every 10-30 minutes
Description:
Hello!

This is a follow-up for the ticket #00440862.
We received an update from the customer regarding this issue with CiscoVPN (Cisco Secure Client).
Today customer confirmed that disabling Advanced Printer and MTP Scanning helped with the issue.
Could you please help to find the CiscoVPN (Cisco Secure Client) process to add it to the exception list?

I will re-attach logs on this ticket as well.
What_We_Know__c:
22/05/2025
CiscoVPN (Cisco Secure Client) disabling every 10-30 minutes when EPP client is installed

Ticket related to 00440862. Andrei Pop already responded back to the client in regards of what process they should add to the exceptions.
Solution_Comment__c:
Closing ticket as duplicate of 00440862 - CiscoVPN disabling every 10-30 minutes
which is already handled.
